mapper.sql: id, name, parent_id, hierarchy, depth, sort, remarks, deleted, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_organization SET hierarchy = CONCAT(#{param.targetParentHierarchy}, SUBSTR(hierarchy, ${param.originParentHierarchyLengthPlusOne})), depth = depth - #{param.depthDiff} WHERE deleted = 0 AND ( parent_id = #{param.parentId} -- 儿子节点 OR hierarchy like #{param.grandsonConditionalStatement} -- 孙子节点 )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_organization WHERE hierarchy LIKE ( SELECT CONCAT( hierarchy, '-', #{organizationId} , '%') FROM sys_organization WHERE id = #{organizationId} and deleted = 0 ) AND deleted = 0
